content: Yes, it will be interesting to see how the Jedi Order is portrayed in the High Republic era. The Jedi during this time are said to be at the height of their power, and it's possible that they may have slightly different beliefs and practices compared to what we see in the Skywalker saga. For example, some early reports have suggested that the Jedi of the High Republic may have a more proactive role in maintaining peace and order in the galaxy. However, until we get more details about the new era, it's hard to say for certain how the Order will be portrayed.
